1.0.2.en: Add EB-Therm 500 device settings to select wether room or floor temperature regulates thermostat

1.0.5.en: Fix bug when setting temperature via homey

2.0.0.en: Major rewrite for stability and readability. Added flows for both room and floor temperature. Moved settings from settings page to pair screen. (BREAKING) Your devices will need to be readded.

2.0.5.en: Add info about using test credentials in readme

2.0.6.en: Try to fix support for users that have added devices in older versions of the app
